sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 采用悬浮交联法制备沙棘混合粉的微胶囊。

sentences.english: Objective To research the way of abstraction total flavone from Hippophae rhamnoides L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究沙棘中黄酮的提取方法。

sentences.english: Hippophae rhamnoides is a kind of pioneer plant in the gully slopes in Soft Sandstone Area (SSA) for eco-economical consideration.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘是砒砂岩区沟谷部位常用的一种生态恢复树种。

sentences.english: Nodulation delayed the falling-leaf of H. rhamnoides.
sentences.chinese: 结瘤使沙棘的落叶延迟。

sentences.english: Aubrey Sea Buckthorn &Cucumber with Ester-C Moisturizing Mask.
Hydrological effects of canopy and litter layer of seabuckthorn are remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘林冠和枯枝落叶层具有显著的水文作用。

sentences.english: The stability of the extract of bark of Hippophae rhamnoides was investigated by UV-vis spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 分光光度法研究了沙棘茎皮提取液的稳定性。

sentences.english: The quality control methods of the seed oil and fruit oil of Hippophae rhamnoides are studied.
sentences.chinese: 对药用沙棘籽油和果油的质量控制方法进行了研究。

sentences.english: The stability of the yellow pigment from sea buckthorn fruits was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了沙棘果实中黄色素的稳定性。

sentences.english: The compound beverage preparation of Matrimony vine and sea-buckthorn has a notable fatigue resistance action on the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞沙棘复合饮料制剂对小鼠具有明显的抗疲劳作用。

sentences.english: The experiments aimed at studying the anti-inflammatory effects of seabuckthorn pulp oil(SBPO)and seabuckthorn seed oil(SBSO).
sentences.chinese: 为了解研究沙棘果油及沙棘籽油的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: The experiments aimed at studying the anti-inflammatory effects of seabuckthorn pulp oil(SBPO)and seabuckthorn seed oil(SBSO).
sentences.chinese: 为了解研究沙棘果油及沙棘籽油的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: The new clarifying technique of dried red Sea buckthorns fruit wine was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了干红沙棘果酒澄清工艺。

sentences.english: The Hippophae is a kind of small berry plant, shedding leaves bush or small tall trees.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘是一种小浆果植物，落叶灌木或小乔木。

sentences.english: Objective To fi nd out the effect of sea buckthorn emulsion on children's functional bellyache.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解沙棘干乳剂对儿童功能性腹痛的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Using the best fermentation process condition, the sea-buckthorn juice was fermented.
sentences.chinese: 利用最佳发酵工艺条件对沙棘汁进行发酵。

definition: tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
dogbane (Apocynum venetum), leaves used in TCM
